channel.title: Spring Boot on SUJIT TRIPATHY
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Boot on SUJIT TRIPATHY

item.title: Deploying Spring Boot Application to PCF (Pivotal Cloud Foundry)
item.description: PaaS (Platform as a Service) is changing the way of how we build production ready software in a much faster and simpler way. Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) is a major commercial version of open source Cloud Foundry. As part of this post, I have take a sample spring boot application and deploying the same to PCF via CLI. The demo application has two REST api end point /addTask and /fetchTasks for adding a new task to ToDo and fetch all the ToDo tasks.
